TEXT.French: No Core area and receive stability and units from home country

TEXT.Italian: No Core area and receive stability and units from home country

TEXT.French: Latin America - The Power of Catholic Heritage:
TEXT.German: Latin America - The Power of Catholic Heritage:
TEXT.Italian: Latin America - The Power of Catholic Heritage:
TEXT.Spanish: Latin America - The Power of Catholic Heritage:

TEXT.English: Military units can enslave defeated enemy units, can sacrifice slaves to increase city happiness
TEXT.French: Les unités militaires peuvent asservir les unités vaincues, et il est possible de sacrifier des esclaves pour augmenter le bonheur des villes
TEXT.German: Versklavung besiegter feindlicher Einheiten durch Militäreinheiten, can Sklaven opfern, um Zufriedenheit in Städten zu erhöhen
TEXT.Italian: Le unità militari possono schiavizzare le unità nemiche sconfitte
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades militares pueden esclavizar a las unidades enemigas derrotadas

TEXT.English: Woodlands - The Power of Companion Planting:
TEXT.French: Woodlands - The Power of Companion Planting:
TEXT.German: Woodlands - The Power of Companion Planting:
TEXT.Italian: Woodlands - The Power of Companion Planting:
TEXT.Spanish: Woodlands - The Power of Companion Planting:

TEXT.English: Start with five free Great People and extra [ICON_HAPPY] from settled Great People
TEXT.French: Start with five free Great People and extra [ICON_HAPPY] from settled Great People
TEXT.German: Start with five free Great People and extra [ICON_HAPPY] from settled Great People
TEXT.Italian: Start with five free Great People and extra [ICON_HAPPY] from settled Great People
TEXT.Spanish: AStart with five free Great People and extra [ICON_HAPPY] from settled Great People

TEXT.English: The Power of the American Dream:
Additional happiness from running Democracy, Constitution, Individualism and Free Enterprise
TEXT.French: Bonheur additionnel avec les doctrines démocratie, constitution, individualisme et libre entreprise
TEXT.German: Zusätzliche Zufriedenheit unter Demokratie, Verfassung, Individualismus und Freiem Unternehmertum
TEXT.Italian: Additional happiness from running Democracy, Constitution, Individualism and Free Enterprise
TEXT.Spanish: Additional happiness from running Democracy, Constitution, Individualism and Free Enterprise

TEXT.English: Great Generals can start Golden Ages
TEXT.French: Les généraux illustres peuvent déclencher un âge d'or
TEXT.German: Große Generäle können Goldene Zeitalter auslösen
TEXT.Italian: Great Generals can start Golden Ages
TEXT.Spanish: Great Generals can start Golden Ages

TEXT.English: The Power of the Triple Alliance:
TEXT.French: The Power of the Triple Alliance:
TEXT.German: The Power of the Triple Alliance:
TEXT.Italian: The Power of the Triple Alliance:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of the Triple Alliance:

TEXT.English: Sugar counts as oil for Oil Industry
TEXT.French: Le sucre compte comme du pétrole pour l'Industrie pétrolière
TEXT.German: Zucker zählt als Öl für die Ölindustrie
TEXT.Italian: Sugar counts as oil for Oil Industry
TEXT.Spanish: Sugar counts as oil for Oil Industry

TEXT.English: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America
TEXT.French: Pas de résistance à la conquête de villes en Amérique latine
TEXT.German: Keinen Widerstand in eroberten Städten in Lateinamerika
TEXT.Italian: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America
TEXT.Spanish: No City Resistance on Conquest in Latin America

TEXT.English: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.French: %s1 a levé une armée pour conquérir notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: %s1 hat eine Armee zum Angriff auf unsere Zivilisation zusammengestellt!
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 has fielded an army to conquer our civilization!

TEXT.English: +2 Immigration in Coastal Cities and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Logging Camps
TEXT.French: +2 Immigration in Coastal Cities and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Logging Camps
TEXT.German: +2 Immigration in Coastal Cities and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Logging Camps
TEXT.Italian: +2 Immigration in Coastal Cities and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Logging Camps
TEXT.Spanish: +2 Immigration in Coastal Cities and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Logging Camps

TEXT.English: Forts claim more territory, are 50% cheaper to construct, and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Forts
TEXT.French: Forts claim more territory, are 50% cheaper to construct, and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Forts
TEXT.German: Forts claim more territory, are 50% cheaper to construct, and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Forts

TEXT.Spanish: Forts claim more territory, are 50% cheaper to construct, and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Forts
El poder de la Compañía de las Indias:

TEXT.English: Naval Units start with Navigation II and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Camps
TEXT.French: Naval Units start with Navigation II and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Camps
TEXT.German: Naval Units start with Navigation II and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Camps
TEXT.Italian: Naval Units start with Navigation II and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Camps
TEXT.Spanish: Naval Units start with Navigation II and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Camps

TEXT.English: The Power of the Long Count:
TEXT.Italian: The Power of the Long Count:
TEXT.Spanish: The Power of the Long Count:

TEXT.English: Cities receive additional food whenever a technology is discovered before the Middle Ages
TEXT.French: Les villes reçoivent de la nourriture lors de la découverte de technologies avant le Moyen Âge
TEXT.German: Städte erhalten zusätzliche Nahrung für jede Technologie, die vor dem Mittelalter entdeckt wird
TEXT.Italian: Cities receive additional food whenever a technology is discovered before the Middle Ages
TEXT.Spanish: Cities receive additional food whenever a technology is discovered before the Middle Ages

TEXT.French: Les fermes peuvent être construites sur les collines

TEXT.English: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.French: Pas de pénalité pour l'expansion culturelle sur les cases d'océan
TEXT.German: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.Italian: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles
TEXT.Spanish: No penalties for cultural expansion over Ocean tiles

TEXT.English: Ships start with Combat II and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Plantations
TEXT.French: Ships start with Combat II and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Plantations
TEXT.German: Ships start with Combat II and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Plantations
TEXT.Italian: Ships start with Combat II and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Plantations
TEXT.Spanish: Ships start with Combat II and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Plantations

TEXT.English: Improvements are 50% cheaper to construct and +1 [ICON_FOOD] on Camps
TEXT.French: Improvements are 50% cheaper to construct and +1 [ICON_FOOD] on Camps
TEXT.German: Improvements are 50% cheaper to construct and +1 [ICON_FOOD] on Camps
TEXT.Italian: Improvements are 50% cheaper to construct and +1 [ICON_FOOD] on Camps
TEXT.Spanish: Improvements are 50% cheaper to construct and +1 [ICON_FOOD] on Camps

TEXT.English: Reduced Instability from Cities and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Mines
TEXT.French: Reduced Instability from Cities and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Mines
TEXT.German: Reduced Instability from Cities and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Mines
TEXT.Italian: Reduced Instability from Cities and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Mines
TEXT.Spanish: Reduced Instability from Cities and +2 [ICON_COMMERCE] on Mines

TEXT.English: Melee units do not require strategic resources
TEXT.French: Les unités de combat rapproché ne requièrent pas de ressources stratégiques
TEXT.German: Melee units do not require strategic resources
TEXT.Italian: Melee units do not require strategic resources
TEXT.Spanish: Melee units do not require strategic resources

TEXT.English: +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] from Cities on Hills and +1 Priest Slot from Pagan Temples
TEXT.French: +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] from Cities on Hills and +1 Priest Slot from Pagan Temples
TEXT.German: +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] from Cities on Hills and +1 Priest Slot from Pagan Temples

TEXT.English: The Power of the Mochica Heritage:
TEXT.Spanish: El poder de las mochica heritage:

TEXT.English: Recieves a Free Artist in the capital for every other improved resource in Northwestern South American.

TEXT.German: Recieves a Free Artist in the capital for every other improved resource in Northwestern South American.
TEXT.Italian: Recieves a Free Artist in the capital for every other improved resource in Northwestern South American.
TEXT.Spanish: Recieves a Free Artist in the capital for every other improved resource in Northwestern South American.

TEXT.English: Trade routes do not require roads
TEXT.French: Trade routes do not require roads
TEXT.German: Trade routes do not require roads
TEXT.Italian: Trade routes do not require roads
TEXT.Spanish: Trade routes do not require roads

TEXT.English: Tribes in your borders are automatically contacted and convert to Cottages
